author: alita85
content: I'd like to give a short RFC next all core devs regarding BLS12, my research on it, and my plans moving forward

author: alita85
content: or would it be better to just discuss that here?

author: sky.cactus
content: The more stuff we can move out of the all core dev call the better IMO.  That call runs out of time *every* session.

author: sky.cactus
content: At the least, I recommend *starting* here and then bringing it up at ACD call after, to handle as much feedback as possible prior to the ACD call.

author: hudsonjameson
content: I'm with <@301186049323958275>. Great to start outside of ACD and then present once it is further along. Very excited to see your work!
